nodes.text: 5-Minute Star Wars Stories is an announced collection of twelve Star Wars children's stories. It is a refresh of the 2015 collection of the same name but features all-new stories. The book was scheduled for publication on November 3, 2020, but was never released. The book's publisher, Disney–Lucasfilm Press has not officially confirmed the title's cancellation.
A refresh of 2015's 5-Minute Star Wars Stories, this collection features twelve all-new tales that retell iconic scenes from Episodes I-IX.
